snippet: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon announced Thursday that he had appointed Staffan de Mistura, a veteran diplomat of Italian-Swedish heritage, to be the new special envoy responsible for seeking an end to the conflict in Syria.
abstract: United Nations Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon appoints Staffan de Mistura to be new special envoy responsible for seeking end to Syrian conflict.
lead_paragraph: Secretary General Ban Ki-moon announced Thursday that he had appointed Staffan de Mistura, a veteran diplomat of Italian-Swedish heritage, to be the new special envoy responsible for seeking an end to the conflict in Syria.
